name: Homing MeSoul
description:
Attention: This co-op party game require you to have friends or family willing to play games with you! ( ´･ᴗ･` ) (Up to 8 players)

Get out of the home, try your best to grab stuff and bring them home, make your lovely family great again together, and compete with each other for the title of "THE ULTIMATE BREADWINNER"!

No matter where you go and what you strive for, eventually, you will go home.

Tutorial
- You only need 1 key to play the game
- Tap / Double Tap / Hold

Developer
Originally developed by AngerStudio as an entry to GGJ2019, then polished to a at least somewhat enjoyable partygame by No3371.
